main.name: Jaka Daneu
main.description: Hire me and I will make your life easier!
main.bio: My name is Jaka, I'm a MERN Developer and I will make your day easier! I used to play pro basketball in Europe. I recently rediscovered my passion for programming and here I am now.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I have basic skills of Mongo DB, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Node.js, Expres.js

education.school: High School of Computer Science Ljubljana

work.title: If I love the project, I will take it

projects.title: Travel Expenses App
projects.category: App to keep track of your travel expenses (ExpressJS, MongoDB, NodeJS, HBS)

projects.title: MERN Stack Amazon Clone

testimonials.text: Jaka is self taught MERN developer. He is dedicated, very professional and eager to learn new technologies. I enjoy working with him.
testimonials.user: Kristijan Mirčeta, Full-stack Software Engineer and Advisor @Birokrat IT
